ComicInfo.Penciller: Bernie Krigstein,Bob Brown,Curt Swan,Henry Boltinoff,Morris Waldinger,Curt Swan,Bob Brown,Win Mortimer,Henry Boltinoff,Morris Waldinger
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Fell in Love with a Witch!: Private investigator Carter Blake falls head over heels in love with Jean Brewster. Without knowing anything about her, he's willing to marry her. Checking old newspaper clippings, Blake finds out that his fiancé seems to possess witch-like powers. Three of her former husbands died after her "kiss of death."
Man or Monster?: Dr. Hunt gets addicted to a formula which transforms him into a brutish beast and commands him to murder his friends. Hunt remains undetected because he changes back to human form just in time.
The Curse of Seabury Manor: A man spends the night in haunted Seabury Manor and dies 24 hours later. Just before he was able to develop photographic proof of a ghost living there.
Wanda Was a Werewolf!: Doug Martin visits the village of his fiancé Wanda where the townsfolk are hunting a female werewolf. Martin is led to believe that Wanda is the beast but then discovers a plot to drug her into her strange behavior.
The Ghost of Paris!: In Paris, Missouri, a woman in black haunted the town for years.
Superstitious Lover!: A young man thinks a ghost is following him, but it's only a white ribbon attached to his hat.
ComicInfo.Tags: New York City,Werewolves,Casey the Cop,United States Army,Captain Tootsie,Kentucky,Missouri,The Ozarks
ComicInfo.Title: I Fell in Love with a Witch!; Man or Monster?; The Curse of Seabury Manor; Wanda Was a Werewolf!; The Ghost of Paris!; Superstitious Lover!
